thread.title: Richford man accused of exposing himself to a child
thread.title_full: Richford man accused of exposing himself to a child - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Richford man accused of exposing himself to a child
text:
ENOSBURGH FALLS, Vt. - A Richford man is accused of exposing himself at a campground.
Police say 27-year-old Adam Cross flashed a juvenile female at Lake Carmi State Park campground last week. He was arrested Thursday and released.
He'll be in court later this month.
